mods.note: Black and white images in JPEG
Digitized journal and photograph collection, part of the Great Smoky Mountains Regional Project, University of Tennessee Libraries, Knoxville Tennessee

Personal journal of Albert G. "Dutch" Roth, documenting hikes in the Great Smoky Mountains area through stories and photographs spanning 1924-1959. With his camera and typewriter, Dutch records observations of the people and places of the mountains from 728 documented hikes
Electronic reproduction made by University of Tennessee Libraries, Digital Library Initiatives in 2010

originInfo.publisher: Knoxville, Tenn. : University of Tennessee Libraries, Digital Library Initiatives

titleInfo.title: Location of originals: University of Tennessee, Knoxville Libraries. Special Collections
